alert.note: Alert for Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 10:09PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST BATON ROUGE, SOUTHEASTERN POINTE COUPEE, NORTHWESTERN LIVINGSTON, NORTHERN IBERVILLE AND EAST BATON ROUGE PARISHES THROUGH 1045 PM CST... At 1008 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Roads to 6 miles northeast of Butte La Rose. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Plaquemine, Port Allen, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly, Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Westminster, Erwinville, Watson, Ramah, Greenwell Spring, and Merrydale. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 127 and 162. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
